Plot: After her death, a mother returns to her home town in order to fix the situations she couldn't resolve during her life.
Title: Volver
Actors: Penélope Cruz, Carmen Maura, Lola Dueñas, Blanca Portillo
tomatoConsensus: Volver catches director Pedro Almodovar and star Penelope Cruz at the peak of their respective powers, in service of a layered, thought-provoking film.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 60 wins & 80 nominations.
